resources.string: When you get rid of the infinity icon all 3rd party app icons became huge.\nTo fix that you should change the size of the icons in a section bellow.
For Meizu Pro 5 in flyme 6 I recommend set the size to 46.\nFor the higher screen resolutions you should use the higher size.
You can still get access to the module through the xposed installer.
This value determines how much will be top and bottom padding for ticker notification icon.
To apply any changes close the app and reboot your device.

MC stands for Meizu Customized. These icons (e.g whatsapp) are already has been shown without this module. But you can disable them and see what will happen. May be there will not be any difference at all.
I have spend a lot of hours and days to get things work.\nIf you wish you can donate to me.

Add settings icon to status bar like flyme 5 (Use only if you have Flyme 6)
Add clock shortcut tapping into statusbar clock (Use only if you have Flyme 6)
Add calendar shortcut tapping into statusbar date (Use only if you have Flyme 6)
